entry.title: Wi-Fi Backscatter communication
entry.content:
Abstract

This article is about a new way of communication for edge IoT devices. Aims at transmitting information of sensors without consuming energy or even store energy for sensing environment.It is a great method to deal with situation which may encounter some problems like short-energy.We realise this method based on 802.11.ac frame structure, using a mcu controling RFID switch to change the resist value, which cause the changing in phase of the Wi-Fi packets.The **180 degrees** inversion in phase of Wi-Fi packets will destroy the mac frame of signal transmitted in Los(Line of sight) as superimposed by the inversed Wi-Fi packets, which cause the **0 bits** in ACK block.So we can get the information that we modulated onto the Wi-Fi packets without transmitting it by decoding the ACK blocks. That is the main concept of what we do.
